metadata.synopsis: Debate between 2 BM patrons. One is trying to convince the other to skip a date and instead come back to the ship. Player can weigh in.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Talk to either S_LOW_BlushingMermaid_Patron_01_4e7b519f-3e47-45d7- or S_LOW_BlushingMermaid_Patron_09_da46cc19-8972-478a-b063-7f7a5f61ae93 while both of them are available

3.speaker: Svend
3.text: I have a date to get to - finish your bloody drink.

19.speaker: Siggy
19.text: I will finish it in my own damn time - thank you very much.
19.context: NodeContext: doesn't want him to go, grumpy

24.speaker: Siggy
24.text: We need to tell the captain about this - he's old friends with Grisly.
24.context: NodeContext: worried, she's just seen/heard a fight with recaps

40.speaker: Svend
40.text: We'll get the word out, but this ain't our problem. Nor yours, mate. Suggest you scarper while the going is good.
40.context: NodeContext: first sentence said to siggy, next two said to player.

51.speaker: Siggy
51.text: You're going on a date? Are you joking? The city is a hair's breadth from violence, and we're shipping off at first light!

48.speaker: Svend
48.text: So? I'll be back by then.
48.context: NodeContext: shrug, really doesn't see the fuss his friend is making

44.speaker: Siggy
44.text: Mate, you'd be late to your own funeral. Look, skip the date, and I'll take you out next time we port, all right?
44.context: NodeContext: frustrated, scared for her friend. Tryying to keep it light at the end.

53.speaker: Narrator
53.text: *Her eyes shine with concern and love - that of more than a friend.*

29.speaker: Player
29.text: The armies of the Absolute could attack at any moment, and you're worried about a date?

8.speaker: Svend
8.text: Mate, we once docked at Moonshae while a fomorian chucked rocks at us - yet here I stand, not a bother on me!
8.context: NodeContext: rolling his eyes, laughing it off

6.speaker: Svend
6.text: You lot worry too much. Now, let's finish our drinks, yeah? I don't want to be late.

45.speaker: Player
45.text: This woman clearly loves and worries about you. You should listen to her.

17.speaker: Siggy
17.text: Love? Ah, well, I wouldn't go that far but... yeah. I'm worried about you, mate. Ship wouldn't be the same without you.
17.context: NodeContext: loves her friend dearly but is trying to be cool about it, kind of awkward but very adorable

36.speaker: Svend
36.text: Oh, come on - you know I'm a sucker for that soppy shit.

38.speaker: Svend
38.text: Fine - no date. But let's say we grab another one here for the road - my treat?

16.speaker: Player
16.text: She's right - you should leave the city while you have the chance.

9.speaker: Siggy
9.text: See? The slightly creepy eavesdropper agrees with me.

14.speaker: Siggy
14.text: I'll sweeten the deal - come back tonight, and I'll give you the good hammock.

47.speaker: Svend
47.text: Bloody hells, you're like a stray with a bone. Fine - but only because it's you asking.
47.context: NodeContext: acting more annoyed then he is, big smile at the end. Love his friend

13.speaker: Svend
13.text: Did I ask you, mate? No. And neither you nor mother hen here are going to stop me from having a good time.
13.context: NodeContext: slightly annoyed, more confused why everyone is making such a big deal out of this

10.speaker: Svend
10.text: Give over - we're done talking about this.
10.context: NodeContext: slightly annoyed, more confused why this is all such a big deal

35.speaker: Player
35.text: This woman is offering to buy you drinks - for free. Skip the date!

21.speaker: Siggy
21.text: Wait - I never said for free.

26.speaker: Siggy
26.text: Damn it, fine. But just this one time.

5.speaker: Svend
5.text: Did I ask you, mate? No. And neither you nor mother hen here are going to stop me from the simple pleasure of a date.
5.context: NodeContext: slightly annoyed, more confused why everyone is making such a big deal out of this

11.speaker: Player
11.text: What's life without a little danger? Go on your date - have fun.

27.speaker: Svend
27.text: See? The dashing stranger agrees with me. And if that isn't a sign, I don't know what is.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Brief, fleeting relationships are simply ripples in the pond. Forego your date - your friend is more important.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: Leave the angst for the romance novels. This woman loves you - skip the date.

12.speaker: Svend
12.text: You worry too much, hen. Now, let's finish our drinks, yeah? I don't want to be late.
12.context: NodeContext: rolling his eyes, laughing it off

55.speaker: Svend
55.text: So, where are you taking me out at next port? I'm thinking... expensive.

34.speaker: Siggy
34.text: Nowhere if you don't finish your drink and move.
